remarks: Value of a unit vector coordinate in a free module.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)
statement:
uvcfval.u $e |- U = ( R unitVec I ) $.
uvcfval.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
uvcfval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
uvcvval $p |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W /\ J e. I ) /\ K e. I ) -> ( ( U ` J ) ` K ) = if ( K = J , .1. , .0. ) ) $.
